name: On the Rolling Dice(GMTK 2022)
description:
For GMTK 2022

Struggle on this rotating Dice, then find a way to touch the red cylinder at bottom.

The rotation of the dice is completely random, so it could be very difficult to win =v=.

esc to quit; space bar for both jump and climb

PS: learnt how to make climb system(sometimes in the air haha)

        If you feel dizzy, please rest. My head is aching because of testing this game.

        Great experience!
